describe: Taiwan, officially known as the Republic of China (ROC), is an island nation located in East Asia. It is known for its modern cities, traditional Chinese temples, hot springs, and dramatic mountainous terrain. Taiwan has a rich cultural heritage and is a hub for technology and innovation.
